## LineTechnique interface

Runtime representation of \[\[LineStyle\]\] as parsed by \[\[StyleSetEvaluator\]\]. For technique parameters see \[\[LineTechniqueParams\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface LineTechnique extends MakeTechniqueAttrs<LineTechniqueParams> 
```
